title: Avenge Glut's Circle
content:
ide you will need to return to the colony and kill everyone including Spaw. Alternatively, you can also take Glut to Spaw and talk to the ruler of the Myconid Circle. You can then choose to announce that you will depose Spaw in favor of Glut. Then if you kill only Spaw without hurting anyone else, Glut take control of the colony and you don't have to kill anyone else. If you take Glut's side you will receive Featherlight Boots and Winter's Clutches as rewards.

Avenge Glut's Circle Notes & Tips
